title: Maou No Musume-Tachi To Maguwaeba Tsuyoku Narerutte Hontou Desuka?
alternative_title: Is It True That I Can Be Stronger if I Make Love the Devil's Daughters? ; Is It True That I Can Be Stronger If I Make Love The Devils Daughters? ; Maou no Musume-Tachi to Maguwaeba Tsuyoku Narerutte Hontou Desuka? ; 魔王の娘たちとまぐわえば強くなれるって本当ですか？
status: Is It True That I Can Be Stronger if I Make Love the Devil's Daughters? ; Is It True That I Can Be Stronger If I Make Love The Devils Daughters? ; Maou no Musume-Tachi to Maguwaeba Tsuyoku Narerutte Hontou Desuka? ; 魔王の娘たちとまぐわえば強くなれるって本当ですか？
description:
Description :
        Orphaned after the his parents were murdered, Uta Rain was ultimately auctioned off as a slave. Certain that he would be treated terribly no matter where he was taken, Uta was in despair. But what awaited him was... a luxurious meal and five pretty sisters. However, they were the daughters of the demon lord who was defeated by the hero 16 years ago?! Uta's fate begins to change drastically!
